text: George and Amal Clooney are living la dolce vita! The A - list couple took a night off from parenting their newborn twins Ella and Alexander to enjoy a night out with friends in Italy on Tuesday, July 11. The couple, who welcomed their son and daughter in June, looked tan and happy as they stepped out for dinner at il Gatto Nero, one of their favorite restaurants in Northern Italy. The Oscar winner and lawyer were joined by pal Ben Weiss for the outing. ` ` Everyone was so excited to see him and Amal for dinner,'' one onlooker told People magazine. ` ` They got many hugs and a lot of love. Amal looked gorgeous and didn't look the slightest bit tired. She kept smiling and looked so happy.'' C
